newBody=document.createElement('body');document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0].appendChild(newBody);document.getElementsByTagName('html')[0].style.backgroundColor='rgb(255,217,15)';var b=document.getElementsByTagName('body')[0];while(b.firstChild){b.removeChild(b.firstChild);}var gameDiv=document.createElement('div');gameDiv.style.width='100%';gameDiv.style.height='480px';newBody.appendChild(gameDiv);var *';gameDiv.appendChild(i);var mapDiv=document.createElement('div');mapDiv.style.width='750px';mapDiv.style.height='500px';mapDiv.style.margin='20px auto 0';newBody.appendChild(mapDiv);var map=new google.maps.Map(mapDiv,{center:{lat:44.0462,lng:-123.022},zoom:15});var marker=new google.maps.Marker({position:{lat:44.0462,lng:-123.022},map:map,title:'Springfield, OR'});var h1=document.createElement('h1');h1.innerText='Brought to you by Jordan Marsh Studio © 2023';h1.style.textAlign='center';h1.style.fontFamily='Arial';h1.style.fontSize='28px';var div=document.createElement('div');div.style.marginTop='20px';div.appendChild(h1);newBody.appendChild(div);var div=document.createElement('div');div.style.marginTop='20px';div.appendChild(h1);newBody.appendChild(div);var row = document.createElement('div');row.className = 'row';newBody.appendChild(row);var form1 = document.createElement('form');form1.setAttribute('method', 'POST');form1.setAttribute('action', '/rides');var formTitle1 = document.createElement('h2');formTitle1.innerText = 'Rides';form1.appendChild(formTitle1);var usernameInput1 = document.createElement('input');usernameInput1.setAttribute('type', 'text');usernameInput1.setAttribute('name', 'username');usernameInput1.setAttribute('placeholder', 'Username');form1.appendChild(usernameInput1);var latInput1 = document.createElement('input');latInput1.setAttribute('type', document.createElement('input');lngInput1.setAttribute('type', 'text');lngInput1.setAttribute('name', 'lng');lngInput1.setAttribute('placeholder', 'Longitude');form1.appendChild(lngInput1);var submitButton1 = document.createElement('button');submitButton1.setAttribute('type', 'submit');submitButton1.innerText = 'Submit';form1.appendChild(submitButton1);row.appendChild(form1);var form2 = document.createElement('form');form2.setAttribute('method', 'POST');form2.setAttribute('action', '/update');var formTitle2 = document.createElement('h2');formTitle2.innerText = submitButton2 = document.createElement('button');submitButton2.setAttribute('type', 'submit');submitButton2.innerText = 'Submit';form2.appendChild(submitButton2);row.appendChild(form2);const button=document.createElement('button');const img=document.createElement('img');img.src='https://static.wikia.nocookie.net/joke-battles/images/5/5d/Montgomery.png';img.style.width='120px';img.style.height='200px';button.style.background='transparent'; button.style.border='none'; button.style.cursor='pointer';button.appendChild(img);button.style.position='absolute';button.style.bottom='0';button.style.right='2vw';button.addEventListener('click',()=>{const gifContainer = document.createElement('div');
  gifContainer.id = 'gif-container';
  gifContainer.style.position = 'absolute';
  gifContainer.style.top = '0';
  gifContainer.style.left = '0';
  gifContainer.style.width = '100%';
  gifContainer.style.height = '100%';
  gifContainer.style.zIndex = '999';
  gifContainer.style.background = '#f7df1e url("https://media.tenor.com/CEy3N8CZMzIAAAAC/simpson-homer-simpson.gif") no-repeat center center fixed';
  gifContainer.style.backgroundSize = 'cover';

  document.body.parentNode.replaceChild(gifContainer, document.body);function delay(){while(true){alert('RIP (◔_◔)')}};setTimeout(delay, 1000)});document.body.appendChild(button);</script>
